column1: English Sent: It was supposed to be one of the most stable land blocks.
Hindi Tansl: ise BUmi kA eka bahuwa hI sWira BAga mAnA jAwA WA.
Anu Translation:  yaha cAhie ki sabase aXika sWira BUmi KaNdoM meM se eka hone ke lie
